about_the_game:
This is the demo version of Mini Cozy Room: Lo-Fi.

The demo includes 21 songs from the 160+ tracks featured in the full version, as well as 3 ambience sounds out of the 20 available.
Decorate your own Mini Cozy Room and use various productivity tools to create the perfect focus environment.

Relaxing Soundtracks to Enhance Focus

Enjoy a collection of calm and soothing music that sets the perfect ambiance.
Choose from various genres and play the tracks that best suit your mood.

A Small & Adorable Focus Tool

Designed to stay open on the side of your screen, this game helps improve productivity.
Use features like the music player, notepad, to-do list, and timer to create a healthy and vibrant workspace.
Optimized for lightweight performance, it runs smoothly even on laptops.

A Personalized Cozy Room

Create and decorate your own beautiful, cozy space.
Your adorable character will enjoy peaceful moments in this warm and inviting environment.

Key Features

✔ Enhance immersion with ambient sounds – Play various environmental sounds along with your music for a more engaging atmosphere.
✔ Customize your character – Mix and match different hairstyles, outfits, and accessories to create a unique look.
✔ Gain experience over time – Level up and earn points to unlock and apply new decorative items for your room.

📌 Experience the cozy and productive atmosphere of Mini Cozy Room: Lo-Fi! 🎶🏡✨

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 650 / AMD Radeon HD 7750 (DirectX 11 compatible)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Mini Cozy Room: Lo-Fi is a charming game that includes over 160 tracks of various music genres to help you focus.Customize and decorate your cozy little room while utilizing convenient features to create the perfect environment for concentration.
